meanings.definition: Moving sideways or diagonally like a crab.
meanings.sent1: The crabwise movement of the crab caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: She took a crabwise approach to the obstacle course.
meanings.sent3: The crabwise dance move made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The car moved crabwise through the narrow alley.
meanings.sent5: The crabwise path through the sand was fascinating to watch.

meanings.definition: In a sideways or diagonal manner, especially when avoiding something.
meanings.sent1: He stepped crabwise to avoid the puddle.
meanings.sent2: The cat crept crabwise around the sleeping dog.
meanings.sent3: The waiter moved crabwise between the crowded tables.
meanings.sent4: The shadows moved crabwise across the wall as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: She slid crabwise down the icy slope to safety.
